title: Display,L, Preamble, XL
code:
<gds-flex padding="3xl" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="s">
  <gds-text text-align="center "font="display-l">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge of our generation.</gds-text>
  <gds-badge variant="notice">3XL (40)</gds-badge>
  <gds-text padding="0 2xl 0 2xl" "color="content-02" text-align="center "font="preamble-xl">We have committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative./gds-text>
</gds-flex>
